full.en:
Registration to the 2nd Future Symphony Competition has finished. We are very excited that the competition has gathered composers from even 20 different countries!

Contestants who have already received confirmation emails will have to submit their scores to the registration platform by the 5th of July. The deadline will be followed by the 1st round of the competition. Its results will be announced by the 20th of July.
